form.form: am, are, is; was, were; being, been.
form.IN: Razlage o rabi pregibnih oblik so pri posameznih geslih.

sense.def:
Pomožni glagol
to be
uporabljamo pred sedanjim deležnikom, kadar tvorimo nedovršno obliko glagola.

seg.quote: The Government is considering the introduction of student loans.

sense.def:
Pomožni glagol
to be
uporabljamo pred nedoločnikom, kadar govorimo o prihodnjih dogodkih.

seg.quote: Mr Sandy Saunders is to be chairman.
She is to appeal against the decision.

sense.def:
S pomožnim glagolom
to be
tvorimo trpni glagolski način.

seg.quote: Some milk products have been found to contain aluminium.
Mr Harris was elected by the Council last month.

sense.def:
Pomožni glagol
to be
uporabljamo pred pridevnikom, samostalnikom ali predložno zvezo, da navedemo več podatkov o osebku stavka. Na primer: morda želimo imenovati osebo ali kraj ali povedati podatke o njegovih lastnostih, značilnostih, starosti in tako dalje.

seg.quote: She was slightly disappointed with her Grade C pass.
I'm from Dortmund originally.
The iron was in her left hand.
The head of the Corporation is Mr Paul Simpson.

sense.def:
Pomožni glagol
to be
uporabimo z osebkom
it
, kadar hočemo nekaj opisati ali omeniti eno od lastnosti tistega, o čemer govorimo. To lahko storimo v preprostem stavku, na primer
It's so cold today
, ali v uvodu k stavku, na primer
It's a pity we can't go later
.

seg.quote: It was terribly hot and airless.
It's a shame she didn't enjoy the film.

sense.def:
Pomožni glagol
to be
uporabljamo z osebkom
it
ali
what
, da zadržimo konec stavka. Na primer: trditev
John bought the car
lahko spremenimo v
It was John who bought the car
, kadar želimo poudariti osebo ali predmet, ki izvaja določeno dejanje, opisano z glagolom.

seg.quote: What I'm talking about is the satellite that fell out of its orbit.
It was Ted who broke the news to me.

sense.def:
Pomožni glagol
to be
uporabljamo z osebkom
there
, če hočemo povedati, da nekaj obstaja ali se dogaja.

seg.quote: There was a rustling of papers.
There is no such thing as a happy marriage.

sense.def:
Pomožni glagol
to be
uporabljamo samostojno v podredjih, kjer je osebek odvisnika drugačen kot osebek glavnega stavka.

seg.quote: She wasn't enjoying it, but the children were.
He's exactly the same age as I am.

sense.def:
Pomožni glagol
to be
lahko uporabimo samostojno tudi v odgovoru na vprašanje.

seg.quote: ‘Rose, are you interested in underdeveloped countries at all?’—‘Yes, I am.’

sense.def:
Pomožni glagol
to be
uporabljamo tudi v izrazih kot je
isn't it?
in
aren't you?
, ki jih na koncu dodamo trdilnemu stavku, da ga spremenimo v vprašalnega.

seg.quote: She's Welsh, isn't she?
I hear things are much better in Liverpool, aren't they?
